section.title: Introduction
section.para: Following chapter includes short introduction to this project. It includes lisf of requirements and other constraints. There's also a glossary.

This document is a detailed documentation related to this project. It includes: introduction, design considerations, system architecture, policies and guidelines, detailed design, glossary, bibliography and administrator's guide.
Document is for anyone that wants to get familiar with the system. Some parts require IT knowledge. Target groups are administrators and developers.

Full name of the project is Incredible Hosting System, acronym is IHS. Usually acronym will be used. Main part of IHS is administration panel that allows administrators to manage mail system. It was my master thesis.

To get familiar with this project, made decisions and to learn about some products it's worth checking my engineer thesis - Free Mail System - NIE-2003. IHS is based on experience gained during implementation of previous thesis, it's another step to achieve integrated management framework for hosting systems.

chapter.title: Overview of the system
chapter.para: IHS will be a platform for implementing and integrating mail or hosting systems in different environments - small or medium companies looking for tools for managing system accounts, hosting companies offering services based on this system.

System is complex, requires integration of many other applications, for example: WWW server, mail transfer agent, FTP server, database. Also it should be possible to integrate system with other applications that are specific to company's environment.

Aside integration of existing application platform must be built that will allow to manage everything is a manner undependent from tools that are used in background. It should be a centralized and consistent environment. Also API for developers shoule be generic that changes in tools doesn't require changes in code.

Project is implemented using only open source software, source code of this system will be distributed. This will allow anyone to modify system for his/her needs. System will extendable. foo-baz.com company offers services related with installtion, integration and maitenace of IHS in clients' environments.
